title: Asian Stocks Set for Gains as Fed’s Cut Lifts Mood: Markets Wrap
description: Asian equities looked poised to echo gains on Wall Street after the Federal Reserve cut interest rates and Chair Jerome Powell voiced optimism that the US economy will strengthen as the inflationary impact from tariffs fades away.
content: Asian equities looked poised to echo gains on Wall Street after the Federal Reserve cut interest rates and Chair Jerome Powell voiced optimism that the US economy will strengthen as the inflationary impact from tariffs fades away.
